name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - C.O.D.E. Valor Calling Cards
detailed_description:
The complete The Call of Duty™ Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Valor Calling Card Set includes three exclusive, animated calling cards each depicting epic scenes from military action across the sea, air and land to help honor those who have served in the armed forces.

100% of Gross proceeds received by Activision will be donated to the Call of Duty Endowment and will help Veterans find high quality jobs.

Visit to learn more.

Visit to learn more.
short_description: The complete The Call of Duty™ Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Valor Calling Card Set includes three exclusive animated calling cards.

fullgame.name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (4 Cores) @ 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI® Radeon™ M295X @ 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA and Intel GPUs are not officially supported hardware.
